plot outline: The story is about a group of youngsters who leave their native place for Chennai in the hope of getting a break in the film industry. In Chennai, they rent a house whose owner is very supportive of them. A film production manager recommends them to various film companies. One fine day, all of them get a chance in a big-budget film. But unfortunately, a difference of opinion crops up among them. What follows forms an interesting climax.
title: Thiraipada Nagaram
plot: The story is about a group of youngsters who leave their native place for Chennai in the hope of getting a break in the film industry. In Chennai, they rent a house whose owner is very supportive of them. A film production manager recommends them to various film companies. One fine day, all of them get a chance in a big-budget film. But unfortunately, a difference of opinion crops up among them. What follows forms an interesting climax.
